fields.description:
Release : 0.0.bzr2423.el5

  
192.168.51.9 centos 5.7 64 clc cc sc wal

192.168.51.10 centos 5.7 64 nc

  
  
Testing an AWS method of creating an EMI from an ebs backed instance. Not sure
if this is supported, but might want to return an error in the response for
euca2ools if not?

Thanks,

-M  
  
  
[root@eucahost-51-9 ~]# euca-create-image i-42E307FB -n "imagefromEBSimage"
--debug

Thu Dec 22 17:50:37 2011: Request 5298 was acted upon.
 Transaction: Given to grze by dan.nurmi
       Queue: Engineering Bugs
     Subject: euca-create-image from ebs backed instance fails, returns 0
       Owner: grze
  Requestors: matt.clark@eucalyptus.com
      Status: new
 Ticket <URL: https://support.eucalyptus.com/Ticket/Display.html?id=5298 >


This transaction appears to have no content

The create image call is currently unsupported. This is part of AWS
compatibility.



On Jun 27, 2012, at 3:54 PM, "Neil Beard (JIRA)"
